function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission risk of covid-19 in the built environment","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on robotics for infectious disease control","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Scalability challenges with blockchain-based platform for managing digital transformation technologies.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges with the infrastructure for 5g network, including cost, security, and early stage development.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of security layers in urban environments to combat future pandemics","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Crowding in public housing accelerating the spread of the virus","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural ventilation in apartment buildings","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Densely populated housing types leading to increased transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gated communities as a potential factor in disease spread","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for new forms of risk in gated communities related to urban design and socio-spatial configurations.","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Analyzing survey responses using a statistical package may expose researchers to contaminated surfaces and materials.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting an in-person survey may pose a risk of disease transmission to participants and survey staff.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Different housing types and residential zones may impact the spread of contagious diseases within the community.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate housing unit design for health and safety","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for pandemic-specific housing design","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate allocation of space in housing units","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sufficient area for social distancing in houses","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor indoor environmental quality in houses","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of private space in non-gated communities","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in urban and architectural design impacting housing experience","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transportation projects, including bridges, roadwork, and highways.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Halted construction activities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to close contact in construction sites","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain issues causing delays in obtaining necessary materials","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 within construction sites due to close proximity of workers","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extended delays in receiving materials and products from suppliers","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption to construction projects due to covid-19 prevention measures and delays.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic and legal challenges for construction entities due to prolonged disruptions and stricter prevention measures.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to cdc, osha, and state regulations and guidelines","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide adequate site-specific safety plans","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labor shortages due to illness and quarantine of construction workers leading to project delays and cancellations.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction workforce concerns about working in close proximity at the end of projects due to covid-19","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced workforce and site-supervision workers leading to increased risk of infections","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shrinking workforce crew size due to the pandemic leading to less group activities and more defined procedures","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased disease transmission due to shared housing arrangements for construction workers","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers being in close proximity to each other","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in finding open hotels","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of control over hotel cleanliness standards","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Work suspensions, shut downs, or slowdowns due to covid-19 measures","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of on-site operations and increase in offsite construction","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contracting at significantly lower margins and lack of in-depth investigation into bidding decisions","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of parking around job sites in urban areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to coronavirus on construction sites due to close proximity of workers","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Project delays due to pandemic and government-mandated closures, delays in shipments of materials and equipment, challenges finding workers, and smaller work crews due to social distancing requirements.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longer project completion times due to safety changes, reduced on-site workforce, and time constraints for new construction projects.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential disruptions in lead times and prices for infrastructure and equipment due to the pandemic and closed international exchange markets.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of globally integrated supply chains due to reliance on single suppliers or vendors concentrated in one country or region.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential labor shortages in coastal us regions with shipping ports due to worker concerns about health and quarantine measures for incoming products.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shutdown of international suppliers and logistics companies","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of worker protection and health-care facility concerns.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"}]}
